name: Wash Hero
description:
Wash Hero!

A rhythm game based on our love of the bath house in spirited away and the creatures that inhabit it!

This bath house caters to all those mystical spirits who need to unwind after a mucky day doing what spirits do. Help the staff scrub the tubs and fill their baths with the best herbal remedies for the job.

Clean the tub, get the right combo written on the herbal water tags, and stick to the beat! 

#MovieGameJam
